T02D3506:155a-1: sarba aartha s'a dh'a n+ya a'arya bra sanna t'a r'a s'a dha ni /
T02D3506:155a-3: don thams cad grub pa rab tu sbyin pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3506:155a-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3506:155a-5: sngon ma'i rim pa rab tu sbyor bas bha ga'i
T02D3506:155a-6: dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la lha mo sgrol
T02D3506:155a-7: ma chen mo gser gyi mdog lta bu 'jigs pa
T02D3506:155a-10: phyag bcu drug gis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3506:155a-11: dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3506:155a-12: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba brgya phyed kyis do shal byas pa /
T02D3506:155a-13: 'gro ba rnams skyob pa'i stobs chen mo zhabs g-yas brkyang ba dang ldan pa /
T02D3506:155a-14: bzhad cing lang cho gzhon nu la sna tshogs pa'i gos kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3506:155a-16: g-yas kyi gnyis pa ni nag po /
T02D3506:155a-18: bzhi pa ni nam mkha' lta bu sngon po'o //
T02D3506:155a-19: g-yon pa ni kunda lta bu /
T02D3506:155a-21: gsum pa ni nam mkha' lta bu sngon po /
T02D3506:155a-22: steng ni du ba'i mdog lta bu 'jigs pa chen mo'o //
T02D3506:155a-23: zhal dbus ma rnam par gtsigs pa'o //
T02D3506:155a-24: phyag g-yas pa rnams na ral gri dang /
T02D3506:155a-26: rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang /
T02D3506:155b-0: g-yon gyi @155b phyag rnams na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang /
T02D3506:155b-4: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02D3506:155b-8: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa //
T02D3506:155b-9: nyi ma'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3506:155b-10: zhabs g-yon pas dbang po dang /
T02D3506:155b-11: zhabs gnyis kyi dbus su drag po dang /
T02D3506:155b-14: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa /
T02D3506:155b-15: rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas myur du dngos grub rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3506:155b-16: bzlas pa'i sngags ni aom pra sanna t'a ree aa mri te /
T02D3506:155b-17: aa mri ta mu khe aa mri ta lo tsa
T02D3506:155b-18: ne sarb'artha s'a dha ni sarba satva ba sham ka
